thepain:BloodySkewer.NAME: Bloody Skewer
thepain:BloodySkewer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each stack of blood you have.

thepain:Dark.NAME: Dark
thepain:Dark.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Lose !M! HP when Discarded.

thepain:DropOfBlood.NAME: Drop of Blood
thepain:DropOfBlood.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Ethereal. NL Exhaust.

thepain:Flatten.NAME: Flatten
thepain:Flatten.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! X gold of Damage given.

thepain:Happy.NAME: Happy
thepain:Happy.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Add a Sad to the discard pile. NL Exhaust.
thepain:Happy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Add a Sad+ to the discard pile. NL Exhaust.

thepain:Light.NAME: Light
thepain:Light.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Heal !M! HP when Discarded.

thepain:Lost.NAME: Lost
thepain:Lost.DESCRIPTION: Discard up to 3 Cards. NL Heal !M! HP for every Card Discarded.

thepain:Sad.NAME: Sad
thepain:Sad.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Add a Happy to the discard pile. NL Exhaust.
thepain:Sad.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Add a Happy+ to the discard pile. NL Exhaust.
